column2:
"Looks like the number of
frightened faces multiplied
by two. Sara and <%me>,
have you both tried smiling?"

"Xiao, I want to know...
Why did you inform the entire ship about Matoi and have everyone look for her?"

"More importantly...
What are you going to do
to Matoi after you've
found her?"
"Kill her."
"That's what Xion would do... Whatever it takes, to destroy it. Even if it means unsealing and resealing."
"All of my calculations ended with \"Matoi's death,\" as the best solution."
"Because there's still time, we can finish it before it's too late."
"Xiao... you're...!"
"I was created by Xion, I am her backup. It can be said that I'm an inferior copy."
"Even with my abilities, I cannot be her."
"But I have something that is better than hers."
"And that is... understanding the hearts of others."

"\"Let's kill Matoi\",
\"You should kill her,\"
\"Kill it, now.\""
"If I were merely just a backup, I would have said those things without compassion."
"But my heart is saying, \"I don't want this.\""
"\"Do not kill Matoi.\""
"Xiao..."
"Ah... What's with me... This wasn't the logical thing to do. I'm unfit to be an administrator."
"Well, enough chit-chat. We have matters to attend to."
